Header: Sri Lankan Flight Diverted to Mattala
Content: A Sri Lankan Airlines flight landed in Mahinda Rajapaksa International Airport in Mattala this morning due to the misty conditions at Katunayake BIA,Â airport sources said. Sri Lankan flight UL-230, which took off from Kuwait City last evening (Kuwait time) was scheduled to land at Katunayake BIA at 6.15am. However, it was diverted to Mattala due to poor visibility.
